name: file-open-watch

1.0.0.name: file-open-watch
1.0.0.description: Watch project folders, and open a file in the default application when a file is created

readme:
# File/Open Watch
A folder watcher for Atom, which when a file changes is opened in the default application

Right click on a folder in tree-view and add the entire folder to File/Open Watch. To begin the folder watch, in commands search for "Start Watch". To end watch, search for "End Watch".

metadata.name: file-open-watch
metadata.description: Watch project folders, and open a file in the default application when a file is created
